constraints.name: adjacent_removal_cost
constraints.description: 每次操作中，选择两个相邻元素并移除其中较小值的元素，支付该元素的移除成本。如果两个元素值相同，则移除移除成本较小的元素。
constraints.formal: For each operation, choose two adjacent elements i and j. Remove the element with the smaller value (if a[i] == a[j], remove the one with the smaller c[i] or c[j]). Pay the removal cost of the removed element.

constraints.name: zeroing_operations
constraints.description: 有 n 次零化操作，每次操作将某个元素的移除成本置为 0。在第 i 次零化操作后，元素 p_i 的移除成本变为 0，并且在后续的所有问题中保持为 0。
constraints.formal: For each zeroing operation i, set c[p_i] = 0. The cost remains 0 for all subsequent operations.

constraints.name: sequential_operations
constraints.description: 必须执行 n-1 次移除操作，每次移除一个元素，直到只剩下一个元素。
constraints.formal: Perform n-1 removal operations, each time removing one element, until only one element remains.
